wikipedia_page.main:
Raffiella Chapman (born 11 October 2007) is a British child actress with British, Italian and Indian heritage who has starred in many notable films and TV series, including The Theory of Everything, Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children, His Dark Materials and Infinite.
In 2021, according to Deadline, Raffiella will play the lead role of Vesper in dystopian sci-fi movie Vesper Seeds.
